item.title: About
item.description: Hi, My name is Stefan Coussens (Malfunctioning Eddie (yes like the robot on Futurama Malfunctioning_Eddie). This blog is not a blog but more like unhinged rambelings in a quest to understand things. 15 years Unix/linux admin and currently an ansible enthousiast. blog build with hugo and the bilberry-hugo-theme. Further information at GitHub
